errors.error_description: The command to install Python dependencies using pip is placed before the command to install pip itself, which will cause the first command to fail.
correction_candidates: First run `sudo apt update`, then `sudo apt install python3 python3-pip`, and finally `pip3 install -r requirements.txt`.
Run `apt install python3 python3-pip` and then `pip3 install -r requirements.txt`.
Run `pip3 install -r requirements.txt --user` after installing `python3` and `python3-pip`.
Run `python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt` after `apt install python3 python3-pip`.
errors.golden_answer: Run `apt install python3 python3-pip` and then `pip3 install -r requirements.txt`.
